content.title: カナダ裁判所のHuawei CFOは、US-IOLへの引渡可能性を待っています
content.desc: A top executive of China's Huawei Technologies Co Ltd who is under arrest in Canada arrived in a Vancouver court for a bail hearing.

content.title: Huawei CFO Meng Wanzhouがカナダの裁判所に登場 -  EWN
content.desc: Meng Wanzhou, 46, who is also the daughter of the company founder, was arrested on 1 December at the request of the United States. Picture: ...
